REGISTER.TITLE: Sign Up
REGISTER.ACCEPT: I agree with the processing of my data
REGISTER.HINT: Hint: Use numbers and special characters
REGISTER.TOAST_DUPLICATE: This e-mail adress is already in use.
REGISTER.TOAST_INVALID_MAIL: No account was found for the given e-mail adress.
REGISTER.TOAST_INVALID_KEY: The activation key is already used or invalid.

DONE.TITLE: Almost done!
DONE.MAIL_INFO: We have sent you an e-mail to
DONE.MAIL_NOTE: Use the link in the e-mail or enter the activation code to complete the registration.
DONE.NO_MAIL_INFO: Check your spam and junk mail folders.
DONE.ACTIVATE_HINT: You received the activation code via e-mail.

REQUEST.TITLE: Reset Password
REQUEST.HEADLINE: Forgot your password?
REQUEST.INFO: Please enter your e-mail address to set a new password
REQUEST.MAIL_NOTE: Use the link in the e-mail or enter the activation code to set a new password.
